item.description:
The event start time is moved to 7:30. Sorry for any inconvenience.

Update since I forgot to include what kind of music this is: The band plays a mix of jazz and blues "that rock", as one critic put it. See you Friday!
Hi everyone,
We are once again fortunate to have another local musician join our group! Please join me in welcoming the lovely and talented Katarina Boudreaux as she and her band peform at Toad's on the the Lillypad stage. For those not familiar with the Lillypad, its the smaller, cozy venue up the stairs to the left of Toad's main entrance. The group consists of Katarina on piano and vocals, with accompanying upright bass, sax, and drums. Samples of her music can be heard here:
http://katarinaboudre...

Tickets are only $9 ($11 w/ service charges) and can be purchased here:
https://tickets.afton...

Let's give Katarina a warm welcome. Hope to see you there!
-Neil
203-645-2008
item.name: The Katarina Boudreaux jazz/blues band at Toad's Lillypad
